marburg.name: Marburg University, Marburg
marburg.content: Selected for an academic exchange program focused on advanced software engineering and research exposure. Strengthened expertise in distributed systems, cloud technologies, and applied computer science through coursework and international collaboration.

sesame.name: Sesame University, Ariana
sesame.content: Completed an engineering degree specializing in Cloud Computing and Cybersecurity. Developed strong foundations in DevOps, distributed systems, and modern software architectures through hands-on projects and academic research.

fsb.name: Faculty of Sciences, Bizerte
fsb.content: Earned a bachelor's degree in Software Engineering and Information Systems with honors. Built a solid background in programming, data structures, algorithms, and full-stack development while completing several academic and personal projects.

ljfb.name: Lyc√©e Jeunes-Filles, Bizerte
ljfb.content: Earned a Baccalaureate specialized in Mathematics, developing strong analytical and problem-solving skills that formed the foundation for advanced studies in software engineering.
